TypeSignature.Value: public interface IQueryable<out T> : System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<out T>, System.Linq.IQueryable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryable`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Linq.IQueryable
Public Interface IQueryable(Of Out T) Implements IEnumerable(Of Out T), IQueryable
generic <typename T> public interface class IQueryable : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Linq::IQueryable
type IQueryable<'T> = interface interface seq<'T> interface IQueryable interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 資料來源中的資料型別。

span.span: The type of the data in the data source.

summary.span: 提供功能，對已知資料型別的特定資料來源評估查詢。

span.span: Provides functionality to evaluate queries against a specific data source wherein the type of the data is known.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面主要供實作的查詢提供者。The interface is intended for implementation by query providers. 此介面繼承介面，所以如果它代表查詢，該查詢的結果可以列舉。This interface inherits the interface so that if it represents a query, the results of that query can be enumerated. 列舉型別會強制與相關聯的運算式樹狀架構来執行的物件。Enumeration forces the expression tree associated with an object to be executed. 執行不會傳回可列舉結果的查詢時呼叫方法。Queries that do not return enumerable results are executed when the method is called. 「 執行運算式樹狀架構 」 的定義是查詢提供者特有的。The definition of "executing an expression tree" is specific to a query provider. 比方說，它可能包含轉譯為適當的基礎資料來源的查詢語言的運算式樹狀架構。For example, it may involve translating the expression tree to a query language appropriate for an underlying data source. 介面可讓查詢是多型。The interface enables queries to be polymorphic. 也就是因為對查詢`IQueryable`資料來源會表示為運算式樹狀架構，可以針對不同類型的資料來源來執行。That is, because a query against an `IQueryable` data source is represented as an expression tree, it can be executed against different types of data sources. `static` (`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 類別中定義的方法(除了， ，和) 擴充物件的類型可實作介面。The `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods defined in the class (except for , , and ) extend objects of types that implement the interface. 如需如何建立自有 LINQ 提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[LINQ:建置 IQueryable 提供者](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370)MSDN 部落格上。For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.
